attributes.action: Mandatory drug testing for everyone working on the parliamentary estate
attributes.background:
We would like there to be mandatory drug testing for everyone working on the parliamentary estate, including MPs, peers and staff, to take place weekly or fortnightly.

People who fail a drug test should not be allowed on the parliamentary estate.
